verbose_text: The product was originally conceived to stimulate the endogenous production of iNOS within the CSMC in the hope that this would increase intracellular NO which would not only quench ROS within the mitochondria but also increase intracellular cGMP to act as an anti-fibrotic and anti-apoptotic stimulus.
evidence: NO which would not only quench ROS within the mitochondria but also increase intracellular cGMP
